articles.description: Simmons -- without Joel Embiid -- scored 42 points in a loss to the team with the NBA's best record. For the ever-puzzling Simmons, it leaves questions about whether he can do it again.
articles.content:
Winston Churchill once said of Russia, "It is a riddle wrapped in a mystery inside an enigma." If there is an NBA equivalent to that quote, it is Philadelphia 76ers star Ben Simmons.

articles.title: Julius Randle goes off to end epic New York Knicks drought - ESPN
articles.description: The Knicks hadn't had a 40-point scorer in 183 games -- the longest streak in the NBA. Randle ended that Monday with the 44-point show he put on against the Hawks.
articles.content:
The New York Knicks won once again Monday night, getting a third straight win by beating the Atlanta Hawks behind 44 points from Julius Randle.
By scoring more than 40 points, Randle broke a streak … [+2355 chars]
